text: John A. Allison IV (born August 14, 1948) is an American businessman and the former CEO and president of the Cato Institute in Washington, D.C.. Allison held a number of leadership positions in BB&T; Corp. from 1987 until 2010 when he retired. He now serves as a director at Moelis & Company. ==References== ==Other websites== * Allison's bio at the Cato Institute * Arnold Kling, review of The Financial Crisis and the Free Market Cure, Reason Papers vol. 34, no. 2 (October 2012), pp. 229â€“33 * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Washington, D.C. title: John A. Allison IV
